installCommand: bash -c 'git config --global url."https://x-access-token:${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/".insteadOf "git@github.com:" && git config --global url."https://x-access-token:${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/".insteadOf "ssh://git@github.com/" && git config --global url."https://x-access-token:${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/".insteadOf "git+ssh://git@github.com/" && npm install'
